sentences: Ei ole v√µimalik sundida inimest midagi tegema.
Poliitiline surve sundis palju inimesi emigreeruma.
context: The word 'sundis' is the past tense third person singular form of the Estonian verb 'sundima', which means to force, compel, or coerce someone to do something. It describes an action where someone was made to do something against their will.
